images.description: DSS image of region near globular cluster NGC 1854 (the bright core of the cluster) / 1855 (which includes its extended halo), also showing NGC 1850 and NGC 1858
DSS image of globular cluster NGC 1854 (the bright core of the cluster) / 1855 (which includes its extended halo)
HST image of globular cluster NGC 1854, the bright core of globular cluster NGC 1855, in the Large Magellanic Cloud
DSS image of the position of globular cluster NGC 1854 (the bright core of the cluster) / 1855 (which includes its extended halo) relative to the Large Magellanic Cloud
DSS image of the position of globular cluster NGC 1854 (the bright core of the cluster) / 1855 (which includes its extended halo) relative to the Large Magellanic Cloud
DSS image of the globular cluster listed as NGC 1854 and 1855, in the Large Magellanic Cloud, using an outline to show the outer (NGC 1855) regions of the globular cluster
